results.name: cuack reimagination from foxbo original from monkey soul games

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
